Name: Cube Dodge
About the game: Test your dodging skills with various toys in a shower of bombs and surrounded by traps in a relaxing, contemplative and fun game that aims to inspire players with ancient wisdom. About the gameplay: • This is an arcade-style casual game; • The player has his score increased over time; • To keep the score increasing, the player needs to dodge a rain of bombs that fall non-stop and collect bonus lives that drop every 15 seconds. Game features: • Bonuses to increase speed and lives that help the game's performance; • Score multiplier bonus up to 10 times over time during a match; • Increased amount and speed of bombs that fall over time, making the game more challenging during a match; • Relaxing soundtrack and pleasant sound effects; • Various visual effects and changes in brightness according to 4 (four) phases of the day: morning, noon, afternoon and night, for visual satisfaction and game contemplation; • A book with ancient wisdom in the pause menu, translated into three languages ​​(Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish and English); • 443 Toy-based Skins, with 22 skins unlocked with the maximum score obtained in matches; • The game saves your overall record and keeps the maximum score achieved.
Meta Title: Cube Dodge: Nov 1, 2022, Milo's Studio and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Cube Dodge? Check out the release date (Nov 1, 2022), developer insights from Milo's Studio, and a complete game summary.
